import React,{useEffect, useState} from "react"; import { useNavigate, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { GET_PAGE } from "../api/apiService"; import { event } from "jquery"; const FilterTop = () =>{ const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const [totalPages, setTotalPages] = useState(1); const numItems = 12; const navigate = useNavigate(); const location = useLocation(); const queryParams = new URLSearchParams(location.search); const currentPage=parseInt(queryParams.get("page")) ||1; const handlePageChange = (page)=>{ navigate(`/listing?page=${page}`); }; const handlePrevious = ()=>{ if(currentPage > 1){ handlePageChange(currentPage - 1 ); } }; const handleNext = ()=>{ if(currentPage < totalPages){ handlePageChange(currentPage + 1 ); } }; const renderPageNumbers = ()=>{ const pageNumbers = []; for (let i=1;i<=totalPages;i++) { pageNumbers.push(
  • handlePageChange(i,event)}> {i}
    • ); } return pageNumbers; }; useEffect(() => { GET_PAGE(`products`, currentPage, numItems).then((response) => { setProducts(response.data); const contentRangeHeader = response.headers["content-range"]; const [, totalItems] = contentRangeHeader.match(/\/(\d+)/); const calculatedTotalPages = Math.ceil(totalItems / numItems); setTotalPages(calculatedTotalPages); }); }, [currentPage]); return (
